title: tannai arindAl
sahitya:
tannai arindAl tAnE pErinbam tArakam idu manamE


anupallavi

  tan pashikkut-tAnE annam pusippadu pOl anbu guruparan aLitta sAdhanattAlE


caraNam    paTralar pulangaLaip-paTra viDAdapaDi paghuttarivAl aDangi
kaTrapaDi naDandu karuttuLLE paDindu kaTTaTra patraTra maTTaTra shuTTaTra
